channel.title: Raga classification from vocal performance using multimodal analysis on Supplementary Material
channel.description: Recent content in Raga classification from vocal performance using multimodal analysis on Supplementary Material

item.title: About
item.description: This project was carried out by the Digital Audio Processing Lab, IIT Bombay and Durham University. The authors are Dr. Martin Clayton, Dr. Preeti Rao, Nithya Shikarpur, Sujoy Roychowdhury, Jin Li.

item.title: Dataset
item.description: This page contains details about the dataset used and information about our train-val splits.

item.title: Experiments & Results
item.description: This page contains more information about our experiments and results.

item.title: Qualitative analysis of our results
item.description: This page contains qualitative commentaries about selected videos from our dataset along with the raga predictions from our model.
